Instance Property# displayStyle

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
final var displayStyle: IntentParameter<Value>.PlacemarkDisplayStyle? { get }
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `CLPlacemark`.## [See Also](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/displayStyle#see-also)

### [Accessing the display style](/documentation/AppIntents/IntentParameter/displayStyle#Accessing-the-display-style)
